column4: how can i downgrade a mp3's bitrate, i want to minimalize my mp3 files for my mp3player
Taking something already encoded in a lossy codec ( MP3 ) and re encoding it ( more loss ) is going to give pretty poor results, let alone re-encoding at a lower bitrate
but i'm not ripping, i have mp3 files only
I know, that is why I am saying you will likely get bad results
